AmountInCurrency.title: AmountInCurrency
AmountInCurrency.description: A class supporting the definition of a unit of currency in a defined currency.

currencyValue.title: currencyValue
currencyValue.description: The amount of currency specified in the given currency code type.

currencyType.title: currencyType
currencyType.description: Code for the specified currency as defined in ISO 4217.

AmountOfMoney.title: AmountOfMoney
AmountOfMoney.description: A monetary value expressed to two decimal places.

BrandsAcceptedCodeList.title: BrandsAcceptedCodeList
BrandsAcceptedCodeList.description: Use this class to describe details of the brands that are accepted.

brandsAcceptedList.title: brandsAcceptedList
brandsAcceptedList.description: List of accepted brands for payment cards.

BrandsAcceptedText.title: BrandsAcceptedText
BrandsAcceptedText.description: Use this class to describe details of the brands that are accepted.

brandsAccepted.title: brandsAccepted
brandsAccepted.description: List of accepted brands for payment cards.

ClosureInformation.title: ClosureInformation
ClosureInformation.description: Information about temporary or permanent closure.

permananentlyClosed.title: permananentlyClosed
permananentlyClosed.description: Permanently closed, i.e. it is not intended to open again.

temporarilyClosed.title: temporarilyClosed
temporarilyClosed.description: Temporarily closed for an unspecified period.

closedFrom.title: closedFrom
closedFrom.description: Permanently or temporarily closed from the given date on. May lie in the future - in this case the scene is not closed now.

temporarilyClosedUntil.title: temporarilyClosedUntil
temporarilyClosedUntil.description: Temporarily closed until the given date (i.e. closure still includes this date).

language.title: language
language.description: Language(s) that are supported via telephone or mail.

telephoneNumber.title: telephoneNumber
telephoneNumber.description: Telephone number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

faxNumber.title: faxNumber
faxNumber.description: Fax number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

eMail.title: eMail
eMail.description: E-Mail address, which can be a general mail address or the mail address of a specific contact person.

language.title: language
language.description: Language(s) that are supported via telephone or mail.

telephoneNumber.title: telephoneNumber
telephoneNumber.description: Telephone number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

faxNumber.title: faxNumber
faxNumber.description: Fax number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

eMail.title: eMail
eMail.description: E-Mail address, which can be a general mail address or the mail address of a specific contact person.

name.title: name
name.description: The (last) name of the contact person

firstName.title: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the contact person

title.title: title
title.description: Title information of the contact person.

position.title: position
position.description: The position of the contact person

Credential.title: Credential
Credential.description: Class containing reference to a credential (identifiable persistent identity)

CredentialAssigned.title: CredentialAssigned
CredentialAssigned.description: Information concerning a specific credential that is used for verification for one AssignedRight. Specialisation of a general credential.

CredentialTypeEnum.title: CredentialTypeEnum
CredentialTypeEnum.description: A list of the supported credential types available for reference.

CurrencyCode.title: CurrencyCode
CurrencyCode.description: Three letter code defining the currency according to ISO 4217:2015 (e.g. EUR for Euro).

Duration.title: Duration
Duration.description: A duration of time, which may consist of years, months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds components, as defined in ISO 8601.

DurationValue.title: DurationValue
DurationValue.description: A measured or calculated value of a period of time.

dataError.title: dataError
dataError.description: Indication of whether the value is deemed to be erroneous by the supplier (true = erroneous). If not present, the data value is assumed to be ok. This may be used when automatic fault detection information relating to sensors is available.

reasonForDataError.title: reasonForDataError
reasonForDataError.description: The reason why the value is deemed to be erroneous by the supplier.

accuracy.title: accuracy
accuracy.description: The extent to which the value is expected to be free from error, measured as a percentage of the data value. 100% means fully accurate.

computationalMethod.title: computationalMethod
computationalMethod.description: Method of computation which has been used to compute this data value.

numberOfIncompleteInputs.title: numberOfIncompleteInputs
numberOfIncompleteInputs.description: The number of inputs detected but not completed during the sampling or measurement period; e.g. vehicles detected entering but not exiting the detection zone.

numberOfInputValuesUsed.title: numberOfInputValuesUsed
numberOfInputValuesUsed.description: The number of input values used in the sampling or measurement period to determine the data value.

smoothingFactor.title: smoothingFactor
smoothingFactor.description: Coefficient required when a moving average is computed to give specific weights to the former average and the new data. A typical formula is, F being the smoothing factor: New average = (old average) F + (new data) (1 - F).

standardDeviation.title: standardDeviation
standardDeviation.description: The standard deviation of the sample of input values from which this value was derived, measured in the units of the data value.

supplierCalculatedDataQuality.title: supplierCalculatedDataQuality
supplierCalculatedDataQuality.description: A measure of data quality assigned to the value by the supplier. 100% equates to ideal/perfect quality. The method of calculation is supplier specific and needs to be agreed between supplier and client.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: A period of time expressed in seconds.

Eligibility.title: Eligibility
Eligibility.description: Class support concepts for defining eligibility criteria.

eligibilityName.title: eligibilityName
eligibilityName.description: Free-text name for the eligibility definition

description.title: description
description.description: Free-text description for the eligibility definition

EnergySourceEnum.title: EnergySourceEnum
EnergySourceEnum.description: Type of fuel used by a vehicle.

FreeOfCharge.title: FreeOfCharge
FreeOfCharge.description: There are no rates or fees to be paid.

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: A general information on the applicable monetary currency.

GeneralRateInformation.title: GeneralRateInformation
GeneralRateInformation.description: Some general rates and payment information without specifying rates as such.

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: A general information on the applicable monetary currency.

Image.title: Image
Image.description: An image, with encoded data and identification of format

imageFormat.title: imageFormat
imageFormat.description: Identifies the image format of the associated image data

OpenAllHours.title: OpenAllHours
OpenAllHours.description: Open or available all the time (24/7)

OperatingHoursByReference.title: OperatingHoursByReference
OperatingHoursByReference.description: Operating hours information that is addressed via a reference.

operatingHoursReference.title: operatingHoursReference
operatingHoursReference.description: The reference to an operating hours specification.

operatingHoursTableReference.title: operatingHoursTableReference
operatingHoursTableReference.description: Operation hours table in question defined by a reference.

OperatingHoursSpecification.title: OperatingHoursSpecification
OperatingHoursSpecification.description: A specification of operating hours (e.g. for a parking site, a service facility, an access or the availability for equipment).

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: The date/time at which this information was last updated.

label.title: label
label.description: A label, name or identifier for this operating hours specification.

operatingAllYear.title: operatingAllYear
operatingAllYear.description: The facility or organisation is not closed on a seasonal base.

urlLinkAddress.title: urlLinkAddress
urlLinkAddress.description: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address pointing to a resource available on the Internet from where further relevant information may be obtained.

overallPeriod.title: overallPeriod
overallPeriod.description: The specification of operating hours by an overall period combined with valid or exceptional periods.

OrganisationPublication.title: OrganisationPublication
OrganisationPublication.description: A publication defining one or more tables that have entries of organisation specifications.

lang.title: lang
lang.description: The default language used throughout the payload publication.

publicationTime.title: publicationTime
publicationTime.description: Date/time at which the payload publication was created.

OrganisationSpecification.title: OrganisationSpecification
OrganisationSpecification.description: Specification of an organisation. It must contain at least one unit.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: The date/time at which this information was last updated.

externalCode.title: externalCode
externalCode.description: An external code to identify the organisation.

legalName.title: legalName
legalName.description: The legal name of the organisation.

linkToGeneralInformation.title: linkToGeneralInformation
linkToGeneralInformation.description: An internet address from where further relevant information about this organisation may be obtained.

linkToLogo.title: linkToLogo
linkToLogo.description: An internet address from where the logo of this organisation may be obtained.

linkToWebform.title: linkToWebform
linkToWebform.description: An internet address pointing to a webform, which people can use to send messages to this organisation.

available24hours.title: available24hours
available24hours.description: Specifies if the availability is 24 hours a day. If omitted, this information is unknown or heterogeneous.

responsibility.title: responsibility
responsibility.description: Specification of services or other duties the organisation is responsible for,

publishingAgreement.title: publishingAgreement
publishingAgreement.description: Indication whether the organisation accepted publishing its information.

type.title: type
type.description: Information whether the organisation in question belongs to the public or private sector.

nationalOrganisationNumber.title: nationalOrganisationNumber
nationalOrganisationNumber.description: The national organisation number in the specified national register, if applicable.

nationalRegister.title: nationalRegister
nationalRegister.description: A national register where the organisation is registered.

vatIdentificationNumber.title: vatIdentificationNumber
vatIdentificationNumber.description: The VAT identification number of the organisation.

subOrganisation.title: subOrganisation
subOrganisation.description: A sub organisation that could substitute its role

OrganisationTable.title: OrganisationTable
OrganisationTable.description: A table comprising a number of organisation specifications.

name.title: name
name.description: The name of the organisation table.

versionTime.title: versionTime
versionTime.description: The date/time that this version of the organisation table was defined by the supplier. The identity and version of the table are defined by the class stereotype implementation.

informationManager.title: informationManager
informationManager.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content.

OrganisationUnit.title: OrganisationUnit
OrganisationUnit.description: A unit within the organisation, which has got seperate location, operating hours, address and/or contacts.

name.title: name
name.description: A name for this organisation unit

function.title: function
function.description: Functions this unit is responsible for or a specific type, e.g. headquarter or sales

PaymentMethod.title: PaymentMethod
PaymentMethod.description: Provides information on the means of payment available

paymentMode.title: paymentMode
paymentMode.description: Defines the timing of the parking or other mobility related payment

PaymentTimingEnum.title: PaymentTimingEnum
PaymentTimingEnum.description: Details of when payment is required.

Qualification.title: Qualification
Qualification.description: A singular set of criteria used to test eligibility for use of a rate table.

withReservation.title: withReservation
withReservation.description: Indicates whether a reservation is required. [TRUE] reservation required

propulsionEnergyType.title: propulsionEnergyType
propulsionEnergyType.description: Indicates eligible fuel types for applicable vehicles

noFeeToUse.title: noFeeToUse
noFeeToUse.description: Specific facility is free or not. [TRUE] (e.g. free to park)

withMembership.title: withMembership
withMembership.description: Indicates that a membership is required. [TRUE] membership required

memberOfOtherRateTable.title: memberOfOtherRateTable
memberOfOtherRateTable.description: Indicates if this qualification can be used in combination with the use of another rate table. [TRUE]= member of (i.e., used) another rate table.

rateTableMember.title: rateTableMember
rateTableMember.description: Reference to another rate table membership

RateAvailabilityTypeEnum.title: RateAvailabilityTypeEnum
RateAvailabilityTypeEnum.description: A list of rate availability types.

RateDiscount.title: RateDiscount
RateDiscount.description: Class defining discount rates to be applied to a RateTable

discountRate.title: discountRate
discountRate.description: Proportionate discount (-) or surcharge (+) to be applied to all values in the referenced RateTable

fixedValue.title: fixedValue
fixedValue.description: Fixed value discount (-) or surcharge (+) to be applied to all values in the referenced RateTable

RateEligibility.title: RateEligibility
RateEligibility.description: Defines the combination of Eligibility requirements with RateTables and associates this combination to a RightSpecification.

priority.title: priority
priority.description: An integer value, starting at 1, indicating the order in which multiple relevant RateTables shall be considered, with 1 being the highest priority.

combinable.title: combinable
combinable.description: Boolean attribute that indicates (TRUE) if all RateTables associated to a RightSpecification with a common Eligibility can be combined to establish a lowest cost tariff or (FALSE) they cannot be combined.

RateLine.title: RateLine
RateLine.description: A specific rate element of a rate line collection within a specific rate table.

sequence.title: sequence
sequence.description: The ordered sequence of this RateLine instance within the RateLineCollection

rateLineType.title: rateLineType
rateLineType.description: Indicates the nature of the rate line

description.title: description
description.description: Free-text description associated with this rate line.

durationStart.title: durationStart
durationStart.description: If used, indicates the start time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session. e.g. the start of a time-based tier charge rate.

durationEnd.title: durationEnd
durationEnd.description: If used, indicates the end time for the applicability of the specific rate line, generally with respect to the start of the parking or other mobility session. e.g. the end of a time-based tier charge rate.

incrementPeriod.title: incrementPeriod
incrementPeriod.description: The time period for incrementing the rate line charge. If set to the same as the duration of the period between the durationStart and durationEnd, the increment will occur once per period, i.e. a flat rate time-based tier charge rate.

value.title: value
value.description: The value of the fee to be charged in respect of this rate line

minValue.title: minValue
minValue.description: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

maxValue.title: maxValue
maxValue.description: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

usageCondition.title: usageCondition
usageCondition.description: Indicates conditions on the use of this rate line

RateLineCollection.title: RateLineCollection
RateLineCollection.description: A group of rate line elements that logically group together within one rate table, e.g. such as the rate lines for the different tiers of a time-based tier rate table.

collectionSequence.title: collectionSequence
collectionSequence.description: An indicator giving the place in sequence of this rate line collection

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: The monetary currency that rates are specified in this rate line collection.

minValueCollection.title: minValueCollection
minValueCollection.description: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

maxValueCollection.title: maxValueCollection
maxValueCollection.description: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

validStart.title: validStart
validStart.description: The start time for the validity of this rate line collection

validEnd.title: validEnd
validEnd.description: The end time for the validity of this rate line collection

minTime.title: minTime
minTime.description: A minimum parking session duration to be applied to this rate line collection.

maxTime.title: maxTime
maxTime.description: A maximum parking session duration to be applied to this rate line collection.

taxIncluded.title: taxIncluded
taxIncluded.description: [TRUE] Indication that tax to be applied is included within the total rate associated with this rate line collection. [FALSE] indicates that the tax is added additionally to the total.

taxRate.title: taxRate
taxRate.description: The percentage rate of tax to be applied.

taxValue.title: taxValue
taxValue.description: The monetary amount of tax to be applied.

relativeTimes.title: relativeTimes
relativeTimes.description: [TRUE] Indicates whether times relative to the start of an external event are used as the basis for rate calculation. [FALSE] indicates that rate calculation definitions are based on local or UTC times (for example the duration of a parking session).

RateLineTax.title: RateLineTax
RateLineTax.description: Class containing details of tax to be applied to a RateLine

taxValue.title: taxValue
taxValue.description: The monetary amount of tax to be applied.

taxRate.title: taxRate
taxRate.description: The percentage rate of tax to be applied.

taxIncluded.title: taxIncluded
taxIncluded.description: [TRUE] Indication that tax to be applied is included within the total rate associated with this rate line. [FALSE] indicates that the tax is added additionally to the total.

trigger.title: trigger
trigger.description: Free-text definition of boundary condition setting applicability of the tax

labelForDisplay.title: labelForDisplay
labelForDisplay.description: Free-text for display on a receipt and/or in a user interface

RateLineTypeEnum.title: RateLineTypeEnum
RateLineTypeEnum.description: A list of rate line types.

RatesByReference.title: RatesByReference
RatesByReference.description: Reference to a rate table previously specified.

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: A general information on the applicable monetary currency.

rateTableReference.title: rateTableReference
rateTableReference.description: Reference to rate information specified in a rate table.

rateMatrixReference.title: rateMatrixReference
rateMatrixReference.description: Reference to the corresponding rate matrix.

RateTable.title: RateTable
RateTable.description: A specific set of rate charges relating to one or more locations and optionally one set of eligibility criteria.

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: A general information on the applicable monetary currency.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: The date/time at which this information was last updated.

activeTimes.title: activeTimes
activeTimes.description: Periods when the rate table is to be applied.

availability.title: availability
availability.description: Availability of Rate to the public.

rateResponsibleParty.title: rateResponsibleParty
rateResponsibleParty.description: Entity responsible for fee collection. Identifies the entity that actually collects payment (e.g. mobile payment provider, online reservation firm, on-site operations)

rateSupersedeLink.title: rateSupersedeLink
rateSupersedeLink.description: Identify the rate table that this rate table supersedes. Temporarily supersedes the identified rate table. Use the Rate expiration times to define duration.

validation.title: validation
validation.description: Are validations accepted when using this rate table? [TRUE] = validations can be applied to transactions using this rate table; [FALSE] validations cannot be applicated to transactions using this rate table.

rateType.title: rateType
rateType.description: Defines the type of rate in use.

validityStart.title: validityStart
validityStart.description: Valid start date/time of rate table.  This is when the rate table and pricing become active

validityEnd.title: validityEnd
validityEnd.description: Expiration of rate table in date/time.  This is when the rate table and pricing expires and is no longer used.

additionalInformation.title: additionalInformation
additionalInformation.description: URI locator for supplementary additional information concerning use of the rate table

RateTypeEnum.title: RateTypeEnum
RateTypeEnum.description: A list of supported rate types.

RateUsageConditionsTypeEnum.title: RateUsageConditionsTypeEnum
RateUsageConditionsTypeEnum.description: A list of supported rate usage condition types.

RefundTypeEnum.title: RefundTypeEnum
RefundTypeEnum.description: A list of available refund categories.

RelativeTimeRates.title: RelativeTimeRates
RelativeTimeRates.description: A class supporting the specification of times for defining rate applicability that are relative to a defined referenceTimeStart of an event.

collectionSequence.title: collectionSequence
collectionSequence.description: An indicator giving the place in sequence of this rate line collection

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: The monetary currency that rates are specified in this rate line collection.

minValueCollection.title: minValueCollection
minValueCollection.description: The minimum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

maxValueCollection.title: maxValueCollection
maxValueCollection.description: The maximum monetary amount to be applied in conjunction with use of this rate line collection.

validStart.title: validStart
validStart.description: The start time for the validity of this rate line collection

validEnd.title: validEnd
validEnd.description: The end time for the validity of this rate line collection

minTime.title: minTime
minTime.description: A minimum parking session duration to be applied to this rate line collection.

maxTime.title: maxTime
maxTime.description: A maximum parking session duration to be applied to this rate line collection.

taxIncluded.title: taxIncluded
taxIncluded.description: [TRUE] Indication that tax to be applied is included within the total rate associated with this rate line collection. [FALSE] indicates that the tax is added additionally to the total.

taxRate.title: taxRate
taxRate.description: The percentage rate of tax to be applied.

taxValue.title: taxValue
taxValue.description: The monetary amount of tax to be applied.

relativeTimes.title: relativeTimes
relativeTimes.description: [TRUE] Indicates whether times relative to the start of an external event are used as the basis for rate calculation. [FALSE] indicates that rate calculation definitions are based on local or UTC times (for example the duration of a parking session).

RightSpecification.title: RightSpecification
RightSpecification.description: A Right Specification explicitly defines what the owner/manager of a Place is granting specific users or vehicles the ability to do (e.g. park, delivery, pick up).

type.title: type
type.description: Defines the type of Right Specification.

expiry.title: expiry
expiry.description: Date/time showing the timestamp for when a RightSpecification ceases to be valid.

financialReference.title: financialReference
financialReference.description: Creator defined free-text reference to financial transactions associated to the specific Right Specification.

noFeeToUse.title: noFeeToUse
noFeeToUse.description: If TRUE Indicates that the related RightSpecification may be used without charge or cost. If FALSE costs and charges apply

RightTypeEnum.title: RightTypeEnum
RightTypeEnum.description: A list of the supported RightSpecification types available for reference.

Surcharge.title: Surcharge
Surcharge.description: Free-text description of the condition that leads to a surcharge being applied

surchargeType.title: surchargeType
surchargeType.description: Indicates the nature of the surcharge to be applied

value.title: value
value.description: The monetary amount of the surcharge

rate.title: rate
rate.description: The percentage rate surcharge to be applied

trigger.title: trigger
trigger.description: Free-text definition of boundary condition setting applicability of the surcharge value.

refund.title: refund
refund.description: Indicates the nature of the refund of the surcharge that is available

labelForDisplay.title: labelForDisplay
labelForDisplay.description: Free-text for display on a receipt and/or in a user interface

SurchargeTypeEnum.title: SurchargeTypeEnum
SurchargeTypeEnum.description: Types of surcharge that can be applied.

TimeZone.title: TimeZone
TimeZone.description: Identifies a time zone by specifying the difference to UTC in hours and minutes, as defined in ISO 8601.

UndefinedOperatingHours.title: UndefinedOperatingHours
UndefinedOperatingHours.description: There are no operating hours specified.

UnknownOperatingHours.title: UnknownOperatingHours
UnknownOperatingHours.description: The operating hours are not known.

UnknownRates.title: UnknownRates
UnknownRates.description: There is no information about rates.

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: A general information on the applicable monetary currency.

applicableCurrency.title: applicableCurrency
applicableCurrency.description: A general information on the applicable monetary currency.

UserQualification.title: UserQualification
UserQualification.description: Class supporting the definition of user group characteristics

userGroup.title: userGroup
userGroup.description: Indicates the user-defined user group qualification

UserTypeEnum.title: UserTypeEnum
UserTypeEnum.description: Types of different users, for example used in the context of parking.
